name: Rhomb
description:
A conversation with four aliens. Created by William Grant, Yuqing 'Rachel' Jiang and Thomas 'Eyre' Nelson at the DAGSoc in-person event for Climax Studios' Charity Game Jam March 2022. Code by Will, Art by Rachel, Music by Eyre. Animations by Will and Eyre.

(the pc distribution is for both windows and linux. for linux run 'rhomb.sh')
